sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Missing Persons Identification Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Missing Persons Identification Act.

sections.heading: Law enforcement analysis and reporting of missing person information.
sections.text: Law enforcement analysis and reporting of missing person information.

sections.heading: Reporting of unidentified persons and human remains.
sections.text: Reporting of unidentified persons and human remains.

sections.heading: Unidentified persons or human remains identification responsibilities.
sections.text: Unidentified persons or human remains identification responsibilities.

sections.heading: Unidentified persons.  The coroner or medical examiner shall obtain a DNA sample from any individual whose remains are not identifiable
sections.text: The DNA sample shall be forwarded to a National Missing and Unidentified Persons System partner laboratory or other resource for analysis and inclusion in the Nat

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
